title: Remove photo from the Biodata page

requirements.text: Remove any instructor photo/portrait rendering from the public-facing Biodata page route (/biodata) so that the page displays only the existing English heading and the two text sections (Professional Summary and Core Competencies), without showing any images.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /biodata shows the "Biodata" heading and the two sections ("Professional Summary" and "Core Competencies") without rendering any elements or portrait/avatar images on that page.
The footer contact section (including the existing circular portrait image and its alt text) is unchanged and still appears site-wide as before.
No broken image links or empty image placeholders appear on /biodata.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not change backend canister interfaces or state for this change.
nonGoals: Do not remove or alter the footer contact photo in the site footer.
Do not change the Biodata text content, headings, or site navigation links beyond what is required to remove the photo.
